originalText.text:
Was highly pleased when Ajay Cleaners helped me with an emergency repair work. I was in a rush and in less than an hour they fixed my dress. How awesome is that!
They also ironed my dress and packed it for me, ready to go.  I feel very lucky to meet them at that moment of urgency. Fantastic job done!

text.text:
Was highly pleased when Ajay Cleaners helped me with an emergency repair work. I was in a rush and in less than an hour they fixed my dress. How awesome is that!
They also ironed my dress and packed it for me, ready to go.  I feel very lucky to meet them at that moment of urgency. Fantastic job done!

originalText.text: A friend was raving about the reliability and quality of tailoring services. He advised me to go to Ajay Cleaners for my wedding suit alterations.  They paid attention to every minute detail and delivered the perfectly altered wedding suit to me on time. I am very happy with their service. Thank you Ajay Cleaners.

text.text: A friend was raving about the reliability and quality of tailoring services. He advised me to go to Ajay Cleaners for my wedding suit alterations.  They paid attention to every minute detail and delivered the perfectly altered wedding suit to me on time. I am very happy with their service. Thank you Ajay Cleaners.

originalText.text: I ordered my dresses for my wedding and bridesmaids off line and the dresses were not fitting at all. My wedding dress was big and had no shape. While my bridesmaid’s dresses would not zip up all the way. Ajay Cleaners helped me a lot in bringing all my dresses back to life. They are a life saver and I’m so happy I found them. Work was done fast and on time. We are all extremely happy with the service! My big day would have been ruined if I hadn’t found them. Very very thankful.

text.text: I ordered my dresses for my wedding and bridesmaids off line and the dresses were not fitting at all. My wedding dress was big and had no shape. originalText.text: This is my first-time dry cleaning & I chose Ajay Cleaners because of high ratings. From the moment I went in to drop stuff off & picked them up, I was happy. The guy in the front was so sweet & so nice, always smiling. My coats, sweater and dresses came out super nice & nothing shrunk. I loved that they folded & zipped everything up very nicely. I will go back for sure!

text.text: This is my first-time dry cleaning & I chose Ajay Cleaners because of high ratings. From the moment I went in to drop stuff off & picked them up, I was happy. The guy in the front was so sweet & so nice, always smiling. My coats, sweater and dresses came out super nice & nothing shrunk. I loved that they folded & zipped everything up very nicely. I will go back for sure!

originalText.text: My favorite tailor in town!! Very pleased with the five star quality treatment from Ajay and the team every time. They are always up to date with the current trends and styles. Fantastic service and tailoring at a reasonable price. Highly recommend if you're looking for tailored or bespoke additions to your wardrobe. Will keep coming, it’s always pleasure to visit.
